de.bioforscher.singa.javafx.renderer

Interface Renderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphRenderer, LeafShellRenderer, MoleculeGraphRenderer, RendererExamples, VoronoiPlayground

    public interface Renderer
    The renderer interface supplies default methods to draw in a GraphicsContext method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void circlePoint(Vector2D point, double diameter)
      Circles the outline of a point where the Vector2D is positioned.
      default void connectPoints(java.util.Collection<Vector2D> vectors)
      Connects the points given in the List in order of their appearance with a line.
      The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)). The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
      default void dashLineSegment(LineSegment lineSegment, double... dashes)
      Draws the given line segment.
      default Rectangle drawDraggedRectangle(Vector2D firstCorner, Vector2D secondCorner)
      Draws a dragged rectangle evaluating and rearranging the corners, such that there is always a valid rectangle that can be filled.
      default void drawLine(Line line)
      Draws the given line.
      default void drawLineSegment(LineSegment lineSegment)
      Draws the given line segment.
      default void drawParabola(Parabola parabola)
      Draws the given parabola.
      default void drawParabola(Parabola parabola, int samplingDepth)
      Draws the given parabola.
      default void drawPoint(Vector2D point)
      Draws a point (filled circle) where the Vector2D is positioned.
      default void drawPoint(Vector2D point, double diameter)
      Draws a point (filled circle) where the Vector2D is positioned.
      default void drawRectangle(Vector2D topLeftCorner, Vector2D bottomRightCorner)
      Draws the given rectangle.
      default void drawStraight(Vector2D start, Vector2D end)
      Draws a straight by connecting the given start and end points.
      default void drawTextCenteredOnPoint(java.lang.String text, Vector2D center)
      Draws the given text centered on the given vector.
      default void fillPolygon(Polygon polygon)
      Fills the polygon.
      double getDrawingHeight() 
      double getDrawingWidth() 
      javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext getGraphicsContext()
      Returns the assigned GraphicContext.

    • Method Detail

      • getGraphicsContext

        javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext getGraphicsContext()
        Returns the assigned GraphicContext.
        Returns:
        The assigned GraphicContext.

      • getDrawingWidth

        double getDrawingWidth()

      • getDrawingHeight

        double getDrawingHeight()

      • drawPoint

        default void drawPoint(Vector2D point,
                       double diameter)
        Draws a point (filled circle) where the Vector2D is positioned. The point is centered on the vector.
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        point - The position of the point.
        diameter - The diameter of the point.

      • drawPoint

        default void drawPoint(Vector2D point)
        Draws a point (filled circle) where the Vector2D is positioned. The point is centered on the vector.
        • The diameter of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        point - The position of the point.

      • circlePoint

        default void circlePoint(Vector2D point,
                         double diameter)
        Circles the outline of a point where the Vector2D is positioned. The point is centered on the vector .
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        point - The position of the point.
        diameter - The diameter of the circle.

      • connectPoints

        default void connectPoints(java.util.Collection<Vector2D> vectors)
        Connects the points given in the List in order of their appearance with a line.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        vectors - The points to be connected with a line.

      • drawStraight

        default void drawStraight(Vector2D start,
                          Vector2D end)
        Draws a straight by connecting the given start and end points.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        start - The starting point.
        end - The ending point.

      • drawLineSegment

        default void drawLineSegment(LineSegment lineSegment)
        Draws the given line segment.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        lineSegment - The line segment.

      • dashLineSegment

        default void dashLineSegment(LineSegment lineSegment,
                             double... dashes)
        Draws the given line segment.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        dashes - An array of finite non negative dash length.
        lineSegment - The line segment.

      • drawLine

        default void drawLine(Line line)
        Draws the given line. The line is drawn over the whole displayed Canvas.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        line - The line.

      • drawParabola

        default void drawParabola(Parabola parabola)
        Draws the given parabola. The parabola is drawn over the whole displayed Canvas.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        parabola - The parabola.

      • drawParabola

        default void drawParabola(Parabola parabola,
                          int samplingDepth)
        Draws the given parabola. The parabola is drawn over the whole displayed Canvas. The sampling depth gives the number of points that are connected to draw the parabola. The higher the depth, the finer the parabola is drawn.
        • The line width of the point is determined by the LineWidth (set by GraphicsContext.setLineWidth(double)).
        • The color is determined by the StrokeColor (set by GraphicsContext.setStroke(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        parabola - The parabola.
        samplingDepth - The number of points that are connected to draw the parabola.

      • drawTextCenteredOnPoint

        default void drawTextCenteredOnPoint(java.lang.String text,
                                     Vector2D center)
        Draws the given text centered on the given vector.
        • The font settings are determined by the graphics context.
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        text - The text to draw.
        center - The point to center onto.

      • drawRectangle

        default void drawRectangle(Vector2D topLeftCorner,
                           Vector2D bottomRightCorner)
        Draws the given rectangle.
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - The top left corner of the rectangle;
        bottomRightCorner - The bottom right corner of the rectangle.

      • drawDraggedRectangle

        default Rectangle drawDraggedRectangle(Vector2D firstCorner,
                                       Vector2D secondCorner)
        Draws a dragged rectangle evaluating and rearranging the corners, such that there is always a valid rectangle that can be filled.
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        firstCorner - The first corner.
        secondCorner - The second (dragged) corner.
        Returns:
        The rectangle that was drawn.

      • fillPolygon

        default void fillPolygon(Polygon polygon)
        Fills the polygon.
        • The color is determined by the FillColor (set by GraphicsContext.setFill(Paint)).
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon to draw.
